cause.description:
Through the means of cheap merchandise and incredibly stupid and asshole customers we will discover a way to destroy the world using the chain of Dollarama's!
Remember:
World Conquest can be achieved through Dollarama's items made by child slaves
1. I work at Dollarama
2. Selling Objects
3. That are useless
4. If you buy them they will break
5. Ding Next In Line
6. I sell People Items
7. That are made by
8. China's Child Slaves
cause.mission: Take over the World through means of the Dollarama
cause.name: World Conquest: Dollarama Style
